meanings.sent1: The suitcase was lockable, so I felt safe leaving my valuables inside.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to choose a lockable bike rack to keep your bicycle secure.
meanings.sent3: The lockable treasure chest held secrets that only the key could reveal.
meanings.sent4: Her heart was like a lockable box, guarded by layers of protection.
meanings.sent5: The lockable door clicked shut, sealing off the room from prying eyes.

meanings.definition: Capable of being secured with a lock
meanings.sent1: The lockable gate prevented unauthorized entry into the garden.
meanings.sent2: I prefer lockable diaries to keep my thoughts private.
meanings.sent3: The lockable cookie jar thwarted the sneaky attempts of the cookie thief.
meanings.sent4: His memories were like lockable drawers, each holding a different part of his past.
meanings.sent5: The lockable safe gleamed in the dim light, promising security for its contents.
